title: A treatise against superstitious Jesv-worship wherein the true sense of Phil. 2, 9-10 is opened, and from thence is plainly shewed and by sundry arguments proved, that corporall bowing at the name Jesus, is neither commanded, grounded, or warranted thereupon ... / written especially for the benefit of weake seduced persons that have a zeale towards God, though not according to knowledge by Mascall Giles.
author: Giles, Mascall, 1595 or 6-1652.
publisher: Printed by T.P. and M.S. for Andrew Kembe,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
